alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued May 07 at 1:55PM PDT until May 08 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 PM PDT SUNDAY ABOVE 6500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 6500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Northern Elko County. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 11 PM PDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...SR-225 from Wildhorse to Owyhee as well as US-93 from Wells to Jackpot could develop slick spots Sunday morning. Snow accumulations of up to 3 inches in spots are expected on road surfaces.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
